articles.author: Joe Rossignol
articles.title: Apple Intelligence Servers Expected to Start Using M4 Chips Next Year After M2 Ultra This Year - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple plans to start using the M4 chip in its Apple Intelligence servers next year, according to a Nikkei Asia report this week, citing TrendForce...
articles.content: Apple plans to start using the M4 chip in its Apple Intelligence servers next year, according to a Nikkei Asia report this week, citing TrendForce analyst Frank Kung. Apple Intelligence servers are c… [+1252 chars]
